verses.esv: 4 Let marriage be held in honor among all, and let the marriage bed be undefiled, for God will judge the sexually immoral and adulterous.
verses.kjv: 4 Marriage is honourable in all, and the bed undefiled: but whoremongers and adulterers God will judge.

verses.esv:
32   He who commits adultery lacks sense;
    he who does it destroys himself.
verses.kjv: 32 But whoso committeth adultery with a woman lacketh understanding: he that doeth it destroyeth his own soul.

verses.esv: 24 Therefore a man shall leave his father and his mother and hold fast to his wife, and they shall become one flesh.
verses.kjv: 24 Therefore shall a man leave his father and his mother, and shall cleave unto his wife: and they shall be one flesh.

verses.esv: 21 “‘And you shall not covet your neighbor’s wife. And you shall not desire your neighbor’s house, his field, or his male servant, or his female servant, his ox, or his donkey, or anything that is your neighbor’s.’
verses.kjv: 21 Neither shalt thou desire thy neighbour’s wife, neither shalt thou covet thy neighbour’s house, his field, or his manservant, or his maidservant, his ox, or his ass, or any thing that is thy neighbour’s.

verses.esv:
22   He who finds a wife finds a good thing
    and obtains favor from the LORD.
verses.kjv: 22 Whoso findeth a wife findeth a good thing, and obtaineth favour of the LORD.

verses.esv: 14 “You shall not commit adultery.
verses.kjv: 14 Thou shalt not commit adultery.

verses.esv: 8 Above all, keep loving one another earnestly, since love covers a multitude of sins.
verses.kjv: 8 And above all things have fervent charity among yourselves: for charity shall cover the multitude of sins.

verses.esv: 18 Flee from sexual immorality. Every other sin a person commits is outside the body, but the sexually immoral person sins against his own body.
verses.kjv: 18 Flee fornication. Every sin that a man doeth is without the body; but he that committeth fornication sinneth against his own body.

verses.esv: 7 Likewise, husbands, live with your wives in an understanding way, showing honor to the woman as the weaker vessel, since they are heirs with you of the grace of life, so that your prayers may not be hindered.
verses.kjv: 7 Likewise, ye husbands, dwell with them according to knowledge, giving honour unto the wife, as unto the weaker vessel, and as being heirs together of the grace of life; that your prayers be not hindered.

verses.esv:
7   No one who practices deceit
    shall dwell in my house;
  no one who utters lies
    shall continue before my eyes.
verses.kjv: 7 He that worketh deceit shall not dwell within my house: he that telleth lies shall not tarry in my sight.

verses.esv: 33 However, let each one of you love his wife as himself, and let the wife see that she respects her husband.
verses.kjv: 33 Nevertheless let every one of you in particular so love his wife even as himself; and the wife see that she reverence her husband.

verses.esv: 2 For a married woman is bound by law to her husband while he lives, but if her husband dies she is released from the law of marriage.
verses.kjv: 2 For the woman which hath an husband is bound by the law to her husband so long as he liveth; but if the husband be dead, she is loosed from the law of her husband.

verses.esv: 25 Husbands, love your wives, as Christ loved the church and gave himself up for her,
verses.kjv: 25 Husbands, love your wives, even as Christ also loved the church, and gave himself for it;

verses.esv: 18 Then the LORD God said, “It is not good that the man should be alone; I will make him a helper fit for him.”
verses.kjv: 18 And the LORD God said, It is not good that the man should be alone; I will make him an help meet for him.

verses.esv:
10    An excellent wife who can find?
    She is far more precious than jewels.
verses.kjv: 10 Who can find a virtuous woman? for her price is far above rubies.

verses.esv:
14   House and wealth are inherited from fathers,
    but a prudent wife is from the LORD.
verses.kjv: 14 House and riches are the inheritance of fathers and a prudent wife is from the LORD.

verses.esv: 22 So flee youthful passions and pursue righteousness, faith, love, and peace, along with those who call on the Lord from a pure heart.
verses.kjv: 22 Flee also youthful lusts: but follow righteousness, faith, charity, peace, with them that call on the Lord out of a pure heart.

verses.esv: 2 But because of the temptation to sexual immorality, each man should have his own wife and each woman her own husband.
verses.kjv: 2 Nevertheless, to avoid fornication, let every man have his own wife, and let every woman have her own husband.

verses.esv: 4 He answered, “Have you not read that he who created them from the beginning made them male and female, 5 and said, ‘Therefore a man shall leave his father and his mother and hold fast to his wife, and the two shall become one flesh’? 6 So they are no longer two but one flesh. What therefore God has joined together, let not man separate.”
verses.kjv: 4 And he answered and said unto them, Have ye not read, that he which made them at the beginning made them male and female, 5 And said, For this cause shall a man leave father and mother, and shall cleave to his wife: and they twain shall be one flesh? 6 Wherefore they are no more twain, but one flesh. What therefore God hath joined together, let not man put asunder.

verses.esv: 33 Do not be deceived: “Bad company ruins good morals.”
verses.kjv: 33 Be not deceived: evil communications corrupt good manners.

verses.esv: 6 But from the beginning of creation, ‘God made them male and female.’ 7 ‘Therefore a man shall leave his father and mother and hold fast to his wife, 8 and the two shall become one flesh.’ So they are no longer two but one flesh. 9 What therefore God has joined together, let not man separate.”
verses.kjv: 6 But from the beginning of the creation God made them male and female. 7 For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother, and cleave to his wife; 8 And they twain shall be one flesh: so then they are no more twain, but one flesh. 9 What therefore God hath joined together, let not man put asunder.

verses.esv: 18 Wives, submit to your husbands, as is fitting in the Lord. 19 Husbands, love your wives, and do not be harsh with them.
verses.kjv: 18 Wives, submit yourselves unto your own husbands, as it is fit in the Lord. 19 Husbands, love your wives, and be not bitter against them.

verses.esv:
4   An excellent wife is the crown of her husband,
    but she who brings shame is like rottenness in his bones.
verses.kjv: 4 A virtuous woman is a crown to her husband: but she that maketh ashamed is as rottenness in his bones.

verses.esv: 39 A wife is bound to her husband as long as he lives. But if her husband dies, she is free to be married to whom she wishes, only in the Lord.
verses.kjv: 39 The wife is bound by the law as long as her husband liveth; but if her husband be dead, she is at liberty to be married to whom she will; only in the Lord.

verses.esv: 4 Love is patient and kind; love does not envy or boast; it is not arrogant 5 or rude. It does not insist on its own way; it is not irritable or resentful; 6 it does not rejoice at wrongdoing, but rejoices with the truth. 7 Love bears all things, believes all things, hopes all things, endures all things.
verses.kjv: 4 Charity suffereth long, and is kind; charity envieth not; charity vaunteth not itself, is not puffed up, 5 Doth not behave itself unseemly, seeketh not her own, is not easily provoked, thinketh no evil; 6 Rejoiceth not in iniquity, but rejoiceth in the truth; 7 Beareth all things, believeth all things, hopeth all things, endureth all things.
